official_title: A bill to amend title 31, United States Code, to provide for more efficient enforcement of certain provisions of such title by making it illegal to attempt to export or import large amounts of currency without filing certain reports.

summary.text: Requires reports to be filed concerning exporting and importing currency if a person knowingly transports or causes to be transported, or attempts to transport or have transported, monetary instruments of more than $10,000 (currently $5,000).

titles.title: A bill to amend title 31, United States Code, to provide for more efficient enforcement of certain provisions of such title by making it illegal to attempt to export or import large amounts of currency without filing certain reports.
